initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run effect give @s minecraft:blindness 3 1 true');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run time set midnight');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode spectator');

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: See that, Aster? You always wanted to watch them, right?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: The Litleonids. A million glittering stars falling from the sky...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: The show is about to start.

pages.speaker: whismur
lines: Mur! Murrr!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Aren't we happy now? Yes, what could be better, dear Aster? Ha ha...

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode adventure');

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ... Welcome to the Dragonhark altar.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: You know what I am trying to do here by now, don't you?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode spectator');

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: That's right. I will summon Rayquaza to this world to destroy the meteoroid headed for Hoenn.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: That is my... It is our duty.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:triggers/stopsound');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound thelamentoffallingstars record @s[tag=!RadioOff] ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s[tag=!RadioOff] MusicCooldown 168');

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Ever since I was a little girl, I have always turned my eyes up to the sky.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: When I was so full of uncertainty that I felt my heart might be crushed by it...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: When I was so grief-stricken and alone I thought my heart might break of it...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I turned and looked up there... so that my tears would never, ever fall.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: What about you?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Have you ever had to do something like that?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Ahaha! You're just too honest!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Don't you know that you're supposed to agree, and then we'd share a touching moment of pain?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Right...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ... I used to watch the stars like this all the time...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Together with Aster. We were always together. In good times and in bad.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I loved her. I loved her with everything I had...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: But I still lost her.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ... Hahaha...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ... I want to see her...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I want to be with her again... My sweet Aster...

pages.speaker: whismur
lines: Mum...?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I will, won't I?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: With this...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Just a little longer...

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run stopsound @s record');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run effect give @s minecraft:blindness 3 1 true');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run time set 0');

pages.speaker: whismur
lines: Mur, mur!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Guess I should say good morning?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: You slept well, didn't you? You look so adorable when you sleep.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Sorry about the knocking-you-out thing.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Enough.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I think it's time I gave it a shot.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I'm sorry...for all the trouble I caused you.

lines.expression: 'If something happens to me... Please... Take this little one...'

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ...OK. Here I go.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: "With jewel bright and borrowed might from the spirits of the departed..."

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: "Through sacred rite, in thy great sight, my life as well I offer..."

pages.speaker: system
lines: The Key Stones that Zinnia holds are giving off a blinding light!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:block.beacon.activate ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1000 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s add ShakeScreen');

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ...Ugh...ngh...gh...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: "I summon thee...to aid...this fight... and save us...from disaster!"

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Realize them...upon this world...! For this do I summon thee!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Rayquazaaa!!!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run effect give @s minecraft:blindness 3 1 true');

q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=338,y=242,z=-197,distance=..5,type=cobblemon:pokemon] run pokespawnat 338 243 -197 rayquaza no_ai=true level=70 moves=dragonascent,extremespeed,dragonpulse,dragondance ability=airlock');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound cobblemon:pokemon.rayquaza.cry ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 100 1 1');

pages.speaker: rayquaza
lines: Kiryararararahhh!!!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove ShakeScreen');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:triggers/stopsound');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound rayquaza record @s[tag=!RadioOff] ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s[tag=!RadioOff] MusicCooldown 137');

pages.speaker: rayquaza
lines: Kiryassshhhaaahhh!!!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Ray...quaza!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I did it! I...I did it!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Now the world...will be saved!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Aster... Aster, I did it!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Great Rayquaza! Hear my wish!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Achieve your Mega Evolution! Take hold of your true power!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Show me your true face! The Rayquaza that will save this planet!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run stopsound @s record');

pages.speaker: system
lines: Zinnia's Key Stone does not react...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Huh?!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: H-how can this be?!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I gathered all of the Key Stones that could withstand your great power...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: and summoned you here... You came...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: And yet... Why?!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Come on! Do it! Mega Evolve! Why?! Why won't you...

pages.speaker: system
lines: Zinnia's Key Stone does not react...

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound cobblemon:pokemon.rayquaza.cry ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 100 1 1');

pages.speaker: rayquaza
lines: Kirrrurrrurrr...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: What?!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: It can't be...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: The one without enough power...is you, Rayquaza?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: The Meteorites that should lie within Rayquaza's great body...aren't enough?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Have these thousand years drained them of their power?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: This...can't...be...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I can't...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I... I... Everything...I've done...till now...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Aster... I can't... I can't take any...more...

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode adventure');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' at @s run particle minecraft:flash ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 1 1 normal');

pages.speaker: system
lines: Your Meteorite suddenly began to glow!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: That's?!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:block.beacon.power_select ambient');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' at @s run particle minecraft:flash ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 1 1 normal');

pages.speaker: system
lines: The glow of your Meteorite grew even stronger!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: What? That Meteorite?!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: It's just like...a Mega Stone?!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode spectator');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound cobblemon:pokemon.rayquaza.cry ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 100 1 1');

pages.speaker: rayquaza
lines: Kiryarararaaahhh!!!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run effect give @s minecraft:blindness 3 1 true');

pages.speaker: system
lines: Rayquaza swallowed your Meteorite!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound cobblemon:pokemon.rayquaza.cry ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 100 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s add ShakeScreen');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:triggers/stopsound');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound rayquaza record @s[tag=!RadioOff] ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s[tag=!RadioOff] MusicCooldown 137');

pages.speaker: rayquaza
lines: Kirrrihrrrihrrrihhhh!!!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound cobblemon:pokemon.rayquaza.cry ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 100 1 1');

pages.speaker: system
lines: Light is spilling forth from within Rayquaza's body!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove ShakeScreen');

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Whoa!!!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Swallowing meteorites allows it to store as much power as a Mega Stone.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Your Meteorite summoned forth the power needed for Rayquaza to Mega Evolve!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound cobblemon:pokemon.rayquaza.cry ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 100 1 1');

pages.speaker: rayquaza
lines: Kirrrihrrrihrrriii!!!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Hah! It's amazing!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode adventure');

lines.expression: '' + q.player.username + '! Rayquaza is trying to build up power...'

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: It wants power for itself to take you on!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Use everything you've got and win over Rayquaza! You have to master it!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: This is the Legendary Pokmon that all Hoenn views as our great protector!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: And the only one who can direct it now...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: It's you! You have to do this!
